oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wayland. Mr. and Mrs. C.A. Wayland.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Columbus Alexander Wayland (December 26, 1868-January 2, 1950) and second wife Ida Mae Early Wayland (March 29, 1869-May 7, 1950). Mr. Wayland worked as a specialty carpenter for D.M. Rose, Lumber Company in Knoxville, TN, crafting custom staircases for houses. He was the photographer of most of the stereographs in the C.A. Wayland Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Photographers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
